p: Fritillaria, a traditional medicinal plant, is among the most widely used antitussive and expectorant drugs. The principal bioactive constituents of Bulbus Fritillaria cirrhosa are steroidal alkaloids peimisine and imperialine-3β-D-glucoside [ 57]. Fusarium spp. isolated from Fritillaria unibracteata var. wabensis have also produced peimisine and imperialine-3β-D-glucoside [ 58, 59].
